summary: Found 3 errors and 2 warnings across 19 issues

problems.description: Only class names are listed; required fields, relationships, and serialization details are deferred to “Section 3,” so developers lack the information needed to build the models.
Enums such as CheckpointTrigger are said to include “all trigger types” without enumerating them, making the scope unclear.
The configuration schema (especially PriorityConfig’s weight parameters and the contents of ChiefOfStaffConfig) isn’t described, so the dataclasses and YAML parsing logic cannot be implemented.
“Provide sensible defaults” is not testable because no concrete default values are specified.

The required Markdown/JSON/JSONL formats and weekly-summary structure are only referenced via other document sections, so the persistence layer cannot be implemented or tested without that undisclosed detail.
